summary: HID HEADLIGHTS TURNING OFF REPEATEDLY, WILL GO OUT RANDOMLY HAVING NOTHING TO DO WITH MOVEMENT, ON TIME, THE LIGHT WILL COME BACK ON IF SWITCH IS TURNED OFF THEN ON AGAIN BUT LIGHTS ARE UNRELIABLE. CONDITION IS OBVIOUSLY DANGEROUS DURING NIGHT, FOG OR POOR ROAD CONDITIONS. RANDOM TURNING OFF HAS KEPT RE-OCCURRING UNTIL PRESENT TIME, WHERE LIGHT WILL PERSIST ON FOR ONLY A FEW MINUTES AT A TIME. TOYOTA DEALER WANTS 1,000 OR MORE TO REPAIR, WHILE LIGHT BULB ONLY COSTS LESS THAN 50 DOLLARS ON AMAZON, STATING THE DEFECT MAY HAVE TO DO WITH A FUSE AND OR BALLAST. *TR
